ABOUT

INDY FRESH FOR INDY'S BEST

Indy Fresh Catering is a local full-service catering company that prepares fresh meals with fresh ingredients every day. Our menu was designed to cater to any event. Indy Fresh Catering delivers to all of Central Indiana. We are proud to be your hometown, local catering company delivering fresh made to order food every day.
